choice.text: Independent watchdog stopped in Halt/Active-halt mode
Independent watchdog continues running in Halt/Active-halt mode

setting.info: Window window watchdog reset on Halt/Active-halt

Window watchdog stopped in Halt mode

setting.name: AFR2
setting.info: Alternate function remapping option 2. AFR2 option has priority over AFR3 if both are activated

choice.text: PB3: AIN3. PB2: AIN2. PB1: AIN1. PB0: AIN0
PB3: TIM1_ETR. PB2: TIM1_CH3N. PB1: TIM1_CH2N. PB0: TIM1_CH1N
Reset generated on halt if WWDG active
No reset generated on halt if WWDG active
WWDG window watchdog activated by hardware
WWDG window watchdog activated by software
IWDG Independent watchdog activated by hardware
IWDG Independent watchdog activated by software
LSI clock is available as CPU clock source
LSI clock is not available as CPU clock source
HSE clock with prescaler selected as clock source for AWU
LSI clock source selected for AWU
